titleStmt.title: Nevv Englands trials Declaring the successe of 26. ships employed thither within these sixe yeares: with the benefit of that countrey by sea and land: and how to build threescore sayle of good ships, to make a little navie royall. Written by Captaine Iohn Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, John, 1580-1631.

titleStmt.title: Nevv Englands trials Declaring the successe of 26. ships employed thither within these sixe yeares: with the benefit of that countrey by sea and land: and how to build threescore sayle of good ships, to make a little navie royall. Written by Captaine Iohn Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, John, 1580-1631.

notesStmt.note: The dedication is in one of four states: (1) text begins "To the consideration .."; dedication to (a) worthy adventers or (b) fish-mongers; (2) dedication is a cancel; text begins "The great worke .."; dedication to (a) Sir Edward Coke or (b) Sir John Egerton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
